verbs.description: ruralize (third-person singular simple present ruralizes, present participle ruralizing, simple past and past participle ruralized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To make rural; to give a rural character to (something or someone).
examples: the curling cloud / Of city smoke, by distance ruralised

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To become rural; to take up residence or spend time in the country.
